meta.description: Minimize the cost of relocating freight cars among 5 regions to meet the demand for the fall harvest.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost of moving a car between regions

params.name: supply
params.description: Current number of cars in each region

params.name: demand
params.description: Number of cars needed in each region

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of cars moved from one region to another

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in REGIONS for j in REGIONS if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of moving cars between regions

constraints.name: supply_1
constraints.description: Cars moved from region 1 cannot exceed its supply

constraints.name: supply_2
constraints.description: Cars moved from region 2 cannot exceed its supply

constraints.name: supply_3
constraints.description: Cars moved from region 3 cannot exceed its supply

constraints.name: supply_4
constraints.description: Cars moved from region 4 cannot exceed its supply

constraints.name: supply_5
constraints.description: Cars moved from region 5 cannot exceed its supply

constraints.name: demand_1
constraints.description: Cars moved to region 1 must meet its demand

constraints.name: demand_2
constraints.description: Cars moved to region 2 must meet its demand

constraints.name: demand_3
constraints.description: Cars moved to region 3 must meet its demand

constraints.name: demand_4
constraints.description: Cars moved to region 4 must meet its demand

constraints.name: demand_5
constraints.description: Cars moved to region 5 must meet its demand
